name: Fondo Marino I
description: The water is gone, we’re the only ones left behind. Like fish when the tide goes out, we go up to the paramo to learn how to breathe again.  Piece from “Fondo Marino” series. An imaginary documentary about the Paramo, in Castille, Spain. An area that was a seabed five million years ago and now is home to people like us, fish out of the water.  June 2021. Technique: Monochrome video. 1920x1080px. Artwork by @LuaFischer. luanafischer.com/artwork
